title: How the Warriors “Stole” Game 1 From the Rockets | Heat Check
description:
The first game of the highly anticipated second-round matchup between the Golden State Warriors and the Houston Rockets ended with a conspicuous lack of foul calls (4:04), while in the East, the Boston Celtics proved their formidability with a resounding win against the Milwaukee Bucks (16:02). Plus: the Philadelphia 76ers struggled to contain—let alone stop—Kawhi Leonard and the Toronto Raptors (24:50), and the San Antonio Spurs got knocked out of the first round in a bizarre sequence at the end of Game 7 versus the Denver Nuggets (37:33).

Host: John Gonzalez
Guests: Dan Devine, Shea Serrano

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
